lines.i: A section to contain information from the patient's encounter with the Emergency Department

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.3"

MAY contain [0..1] componentOf
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Encompassing Encounter

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] ED Observations Section

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Outcomes Procedures Section

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Outcomes Prior Document Section

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Outcomes Discharge Diagnosis Section

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Outcomes Inpatient Observations Section
contain exactly one [1..1] typeId with @xsi:type="InfrastructureRootTypeId"
contain exactly one [1..1] id with @xsi:type="II"
contain exactly one [1..1] code with @xsi:type="CE"
contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime with @xsi:type="TS"
contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode with @xsi:type="CE"

contains at least one [1..*] recordTarget, where its type is Record Target
Contains exactly one [1..1] Record Target

contains at least one [1..*] author, where its type is Author
Contains exactly one [1..1] Author

contain exactly one [1..1] custodian, where its type is Custodian
Contains exactly one [1..1] Custodian

contain exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2
Contains exactly one [1..1] Component2

MAY contain [0..1] componentOf
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Encompassing Encounter

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] ED Observations Section

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Outcomes Procedures Section

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Outcomes Prior Document Section

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Outcomes Discharge Diagnosis Section

MAY contain [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Outcomes Inpatient Observations Section
